messages.subject: Forced homeschooling
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/8/2003 2:29:52 PM Central Daylight Time, Unschooling-do My question is this:  If we are making changes in our parenting techniques, ...
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/8/2003 2:29:52 PM Central Daylight Time, Unschooling-do


">My question is this: If we are making changes in our parenting techniques,

>
> moving towards much more freedom for them, letting them make most decisions
> in
> their own lives, would it be wrong to take them back out of school if they
> don't want to homeschool/unschool?


Yes. I don't think forcing someone to homeschool is productive at all.
I would however, make homeschooling so interesting and fun that they WANT to
come home. Bribery if you will.

Ren


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
